services.title: Products Development
services.description: Specializing and creating high quality products were an integral part of our ethos which members of the company pursued. finally, our precious wide range product LINA has formulated by our determined R&D from selected bespoke solutions.

services.title: System Consistency
services.description: Our R&D team usually works to improve existing or new product labels, size, design, color, Oduor etc. Prototypes and newly designed sample products shall be submitted to the management to obtain go ahead approval.

services.title: Maintainance Management
services.description: We work to improve expected life of machineries, minimize downtime likely to be occurred from sudden machine stops and possess stable workfiow induced from maximum utilization of machineries.

testimonies.title: Cirtificate of Recognition
testimonies.testimony: OUR COMPANY IS SO GRATEFUL AND SATISFIED BY THE CERTIFICATE 0-E RECOGNITION  GIVEN BY THE MINISTER OF MINISTRY OF REVENUES.

testimonies.title: Recognition Cup
testimonies.testimony: WE HAVE GIVEN THIS BY  MR. LAKE AYALEW FOR ACHIEVING BETTER RESULTS IN THE 2019/2020 FISCAL YEAR BY COMPLYING TAX LAW.
